page.title: 20Recreation
page.content: I took a survey of our classrooms hobbies.In my survey I found that quite a lot of people liked to collect odds and ends.I also found out that three people in our class had home computers.Mark Watson has an Amstrad and a joystick.Alan Spratt has a Dragon 32 and a joystick.My computer is a Spectrum and it is small and black and has rubber keys.It has a 48k memory and has a medium power voltage. I also have an interface as well.The computer itself is quite powerful and is quite capable of doing business accounts.Six people in the room have no hobbies at all and two really enjoy collecting Brittans farm machinery.
